channel.title: Javascript on Khoa Pham
channel.description: Recent content in Javascript on Khoa Pham

item.title: Rickshaw Chart Hovering Multiple Values
item.description: D3 is a great javascript library for creating data visualization chart. I have been a big fan of it for over a year now. However, whenever I need to develop a quick chart prototype, I use an alternative library called Rickshaw. It’s an extension from D3, so you can get greatness from both of them.

item.title: MenuOnScroll - jQuery Plugin
item.description: Today I just released menuOnScroll - jQuery plugin that automatically updates the menu navigation when you scroll. This functionality is extremely common on the web, especially for the single page website.
